Service Details: Drop-in Coffee Hour: Tue and Thu from 10:00am - 11:30am- Enjoy a hot coffee, sandwich, a cookie, meet and get to know neighbours and church members- Support is available for referrals to local agencies and resources, in addition to access to the emergency Food Cupboard where individuals are helped in choosing the supplies they needGrandparents Raising Grandchildren Support Circle:  - Meets monthly at the church- The church members are closely involved with organizing and facilitating this groupNew Year’s Day Community Dinner:  - Provides an annual New Year’s Day Dinner, for neighbours in need as well as congregation members- Includes turkey, ham, beef, and all the trimmings- A fashion 'clothes closet' offering clothing free of charge will be available
Address & Map: 721 Bernard AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 6P6View MapQuest Map
